description: Try our easy to follow Pork & Pistachio Terrine recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pork & Pistachio Terrine Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 2 hours. Remove from oven. Cool in pan for 30 minutes. Drain off juices. Chill overnight in refrigerator. To serve, turn out onto a board, slice and serve with crusty bread.
